description: Discriminants of real quadratic Euclidean fields (a finite sequence).
references: W. J. LeVeque, Topics in Number Theory. Addison-Wesley, Reading, MA, 2 vols., 1956, Vol. 2, p. 57.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
H. M. Stark, An Introduction to Number Theory. Markham, Chicago, 1970, p. 294.
links: P. Samuel, Unique factorization, Amer. Math. Monthly 75 (1968), 945-952.
Index entries for sequences related to quadratic fields
formula: A003246 = A037449(A003174) as a set, not composition of functions (values are sorted by size; it turns out that a(n) is different from A037449(A003174(n)) for all n=1,...,16. - _M. F. Hasler_, Jan 26 2014
mathematica: A003174 = {2, 3, 5, 6, 7, 11, 13, 17, 19, 21, 29, 33, 37, 41, 57, 73}; Sort[ NumberFieldDiscriminant /@ Sqrt[A003174]] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jul 18 2012 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
